questions.question: This month, Princess Cruises announced that the Island Princess cruise ship would no longer be making a stop in Yorktown after months of opposition efforts by a community group. Where will the cruise ship be stopping instead?
questions.context: The group Preserve Yorktown collected thousands of signatures in an online petition protesting the stop.

questions.question: The General Assembly has moved to end legacy admissions at public universities. How many times more likely is a legacy student from a top 1% income household to get into an Ivy Plus school than the average student?
questions.context: The Harvard study also found that legacy students from families below the 90th percentile of income are 3 times as likely to be admitted to colleges than peers with similar academic and demographic characteristics.

questions.question: A new report showed that since 2020, Williamsburg’s population decreased by 2%, whereas James City County’s population grew by 3%. How did the population of Hampton Roads change overall during the past couple of decades?
questions.context: An ODU report found that the region’s share of Virginia’s total population dropped 3.6% from 1990 to 2022.

questions.question: The Navy began investigating drinking wells in Chesapeake for toxic substances after they were discovered at a nearby base last year. What other bases will the Navy be testing for these substances?
questions.context: The Navy is testing at several other bases in the region, suspecting that the polyfluoroalkyl substances may have come from past use of firefighting foam.

questions.question: The ACLU filed two lawsuits against the VA Department of Education this month. What were the lawsuits concerning?
questions.context: The lawsuits allege that the controversial 2023 Model Policies on the treatment of transgender and non-binary students don’t comply with existing state law.

questions.question: Campaign finance reform bills once again failed to gain traction in the General Assembly. How much did the most expensive VA State Senate race cost in 2023?
questions.context: The most expensive race was in SD 31 (Loudoun/Fauquier), where Democrat Russet Perry won over Republican Juan Pablo Segura.

questions.question: The new York County school board chair has been accused of having controversial ties to what?
questions.context: Chair Lynda Fairman allegedly directed members of the 'York County Poquoson Constitutional Militia' to film a Family Life Sex Education event at Dare Elementary last month.

questions.question: William & Mary Law School student workers have been organizing for better wages. How much do they currently make?
questions.context: Limited to only working 16 hours a week has forced some student workers to sign up for food stamps.
